column1: Table 4: Number of sentenced prisoners released from state prisons, by type of release, 2000-2009
Authors: Heather C. West, Ph.D., William J. Sabol, Ph.D., and Sarah J. Greenman
Table 4. Number of sentenced prisoners released from state prisons, by type of release, 2000-2009
a/Totals based on prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year. Totals exclude transfers, escapes, and those absent without leave (AWOL).
b/Total conditional releases include releases to probation, supervised mandatory releases, and other unspecified conditional releases.
c/Total unconditional releases include expirations of sentence, commutations, and other unconditional releases.
